name: get one final twist in baby you do it better than anyone else
name_original: get one final twist in baby you do it better than anyone else
description:
You recieve a text from someone you haven't heard from in a while. It is still too soon to speak to them.

There is only one way this conversation can end. There are many ways to reach that ending.

Created in Twine in an evening and a half. Can be fully finished in less than ten minutes.

TW: This story contains depictions of relationship abuse and implied biphobia.

The story, all names, characters, and incidents portrayed in this production are fictitious. No identification with actual persons (living or deceased), places, buildings, and products is intended or should be inferred.
